caption.title: The Change of Highly Suitable Habitat Area of P. tenuifolia under the Four RCPs (RCP2.6, RCP4.5, RCP6.0 and RCP8.5) in Two Periods (2050 and 2070).
caption.p: The mean pixel frequency of highly suitable habitat in the current scenario was set as 1.0 and the others were expressed relative to it. Bars indicate means Â± sd (n = 10 circle), and significant differences at P < 0.01 within in each group are indicated by different letters (a, b and c).
